MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the EH3 and EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:35pm. Our emergency response team have now arrived at the Randolph Lane primary substation and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45pm.We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:07pm on Sunday, 01 November 2020
